detail_desc: Lightly padded quilted jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap patch pockets with concealed press-studs, and a yoke and decorative seams at the back. Lined.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow imitation leather and metal chain shoulder strap, quilted front with star-shaped studs and a zip with a tassel at the top. Lined. Size 5x11x14 cm.
Bag in transparent and shimmering metallic plastic with a text print and two handles at the top. Size 7x28x32 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in silk crêpe with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a butterfly appliqué on the front and an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Top in marled sweatshirt fabric with embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits at the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in patterned mulberry silk with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Satin lining.
Vest top in ribbed viscose-blend jersey with frill trims around the neckline and armholes.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links approx. 1.5 cm, length of bracelet approx. 23 cm.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links approx. 1.5 cm, length of bracelet approx. 23 cm.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links approx. 1.5 cm, length of bracelet approx. 23 cm.
Short dress in sequin-embroidered mesh with a small stand-up collar, an opening and two buttons at the back of the neck and short, wide sleeves. Jersey lining.
Short, fitted jersey dress with a wide V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Short, fitted jersey dress with a wide V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Elastic bracelets in various designs.
Metal bangle with skulls at each end.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves in woven fabric with broderie anglaise and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline.
Pull-on trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and wide legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Gym bag in a patterned rustle weave with a drawstring and air hole at the top. Can be carried like a backpack. Size 35x45 cm.
Chino shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and detachable fabric belt. Zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Chino shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and detachable fabric belt. Zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Chino shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and detachable fabric belt. Zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Treggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. One patterned pair, one in a solid colour.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support.

Treggings in soft stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a decorative appliqué on the knees.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a silicone trim at the top and a concealed zip with a button at one side. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and long, wide legs. Satin lining at the top.
Necklace with an adjustable, imitation suede strap and a metal ring with four pendants. Maximum length approx. 46 cm.
Metal rings in various designs.
Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with elastication at the back of the waistband and a tie belt at the front. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases down the front.
Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with elastication at the back of the waistband and a tie belt at the front. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases down the front.

Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores at the front, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores at the front, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slip-on, fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Slip-on, fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Tunic in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with a tab and button. Braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with side pockets with decorative buttons along the edge and wide, ankle-length legs with creases.

Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted soles.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted soles.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastic gores in the sides. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Calf-length wrapover skirt in a viscose weave with flounce-trimmed edges and an adjustable tie belt at the waist. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with wide smocking at the waist.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with wide smocking at the waist.
Dungaree shorts in washed denim with space for a growing tummy. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, buttons at the sides, front and back pockets and a fake fly.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with print stripes and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Patterned bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Canvas backpack with imitation leather details, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a handle and drawstring at the top. Imitation suede flap with a magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 15x29x35 cm.
Jacket in soft pile with a lined hood, zip down the front and front pockets. Lined.
Joggers in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

Long tunic in soft cotton twill with a button placket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels, a gently tapered waist, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No buttons. Lined.
Glittery bow tie with matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 10.5 cm. Size of handkerchief 32x32 cm.
Patterned bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Wide lace trim at the hem and a wide strap with three pairs of hooks and eyes at the back.

Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey containing glittery threads with a deep V-neck front and back, ties at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Lined.
Set in soft cotton jersey. Dress with a print motif on the front, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Elasticated hairband with a sewn-on bow.

Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets at the front and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
